parameters.name: id
parameters.description: For blob, disk, git stores use file name (<filename>.yaml). For mysql, postgres, sqlite3 use id (<kind>.<name>.<version>) of the policy

post.description: Check whether a principal has permissions to perform the given actions on a set of resource instances.
Check a principal's permissions to a batch of heterogeneous resources and actions.

get.description: Get information about the server e.g. server version

keySetId.description: Key ID to use when decoding the token (defined in the Cerbos server configuration)

actions.description: List of actions being performed on the resource.
Metadata about the effect calculated for each action on this resource instance.

effectiveDerivedRoles.description: Derived roles that were effective during policy evaluation.

MetaActionMeta.description: Unique resource instance ID supplied in the request.

matchedPolicy.description: Policy that matched to produce this effect.

kind.description: Filter kind. Defines whether the given action is always allowed, always denied or allowed conditionally.

condition.description: Filter condition. Only populated if kind is KIND_CONDITIONAL.

cerbosrequestv1AuxData.description: Structured auxiliary data useful for evaluating the request

requestId.description: Optional application-specific ID useful for correlating logs for analysis.

action.description: Action to be applied to each resource in the list.

includeMeta.description: Opt to receive request processing metadata in the response.

kind.description: Name of the resource kind being accessed.

policyVersion.description: The policy version to use to evaluate this request. If not specified, will default to the server-configured default version.

attr.description: Kay-value pairs of contextual data about this resource that should be used during policy evaluation.

scope.description: A dot-separated scope that describes the hierarchy this resource belongs to. This is used for determining policy inheritance.

protobufNullValue.description:
`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the
`Value` type union.

 The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`.

 - NULL_VALUE: Null value.

attr.description: Key-value pairs of contextual data about this instance that should be used during policy evaluation.

v1AttributesMap.description: Unique identifier for the resource instance.

requestId.description: Optional application-specific ID useful for correlating logs for analysis.
Request ID provided in the request.

v1CheckResourceBatchResponse.description: Policy evaluation response for a batch of resources.

actions.description: Mapping of each action to an effect.

validationErrors.description: List of validation errors (if schema validation is enabled)

requestId.description: Optional application-specific ID useful for correlating logs for analysis.

actions.description: List of actions being performed on the set of resources.

includeMeta.description: Opt to receive request processing metadata in the response.

requestId.description: Request ID provided in the request.

resourceInstances.description: Results for each resource instance, keyed by the ID supplied in the request

meta.description: Optional metadata about the request evaluation process

v1CheckResourceSetResponse.description: Policy evaluation response for a set of resources.

actions.description: Mapping of each action to an effect.

validationErrors.description: List of validation errors (if schema validation is enabled)

v1ListPoliciesResponse.description: List of policies stored in the Cerbos server

actions.description: List of actions being performed on the resource.

policyVersion.description: The policy version to use to evaluate this request. If not specified, will default to the server-configured default version.

roles.description: Roles assigned to this principal from your identity management system.

attr.description: Key-value pairs of contextual data about this principal that should be used during policy evaluation.

scope.description: A dot-separated scope that describes the hierarchy this principal belongs to. This is used for determining policy inheritance.

v1Principal.description: A person or application attempting to perform the actions on the set of resources.

policyVersion.description: The policy version to use to evaluate this request. If not specified, will default to the server-configured default version.

instances.description: Set of resource instances to check. Each instance must be keyed by an application-specific unique identifier.

scope.description: A dot-separated scope that describes the hierarchy these resources belong to. This is used for determining policy inheritance.

attr.description: Key-value pairs of contextual data about the resource that are known at a time of the request.

policyVersion.description: The policy version to use to evaluate this request. If not specified, will default to the server-configured default version.

requestId.description: Request ID provided in the request.

meta.description: Optional metadata about the request evaluation process

v1ResourcesQueryPlanResponse.description: Resources query plan response for a set of resources.

filterDebug.description: Filter textual representation for debugging purposes.
